section.p: This class contains attributes related to track the content and interactions with an alert. e.g. When the alert was generated, package id, Status, each user that the alert was sent to. Note that this class may not be supported by HDR but rather from other repository.

ol.li:
Contains zero or one [0..1] associatedPackage with data type String
Identifies the Package Associated to the alert. 1-30 characters in length.

Contains zero or one [0..1] dataForProcessing with data type String
This is a String of data elements returned to the application when the alert is selected for processing.

Contains zero or one [0..1] dateCreated with data type Point In Time
Date and time that the alert was created.

Contains zero or one [0..1] dateAlertProcessed with data type Point In Time
Indicates the date when the processing of the alert was completed.

Contains zero or one [0..1] displayText with data type String
Text diplayed for alert.

Contains exactly one [1..1] name with data type String
Name of Alert

Contains zero or one [0..1] status with data type Code
Indicates the the status of the alert. Possible values are UNREAD-REMOVED BY DATE; COMPLETELY READ; PARTIALLY READ - REMOVED; etc.
Contains exactly one [1..1] author, where its type is Individual Provider
Contains zero or more [0..*] recipientLog, where its type is Alert Recipient Log

Contains zero or one [0..1] associatedPackage with data type String
Identifies the Package Associated to the alert. 1-30 characters in length.

Contains zero or one [0..1] dataForProcessing with data type String
This is a String of data elements returned to the application when the alert is selected for processing.

Contains zero or one [0..1] dateCreated with data type Point In Time
Date and time that the alert was created.

Contains zero or one [0..1] dateAlertProcessed with data type Point In Time
Indicates the date when the processing of the alert was completed.

Contains zero or one [0..1] displayText with data type String
Text diplayed for alert.

Contains exactly one [1..1] name with data type String
Name of Alert

Contains zero or one [0..1] status with data type Code
Indicates the the status of the alert. Possible values are UNREAD-REMOVED BY DATE; COMPLETELY READ; PARTIALLY READ - REMOVED; etc.
Contains exactly one [1..1] author, where its type is Individual Provider
Contains zero or more [0..*] recipientLog, where its type is Alert Recipient Log
